title: 1950s Rebel Movies
description: Leather jackets, hot rods, and youthful defiance -- test your knowledge of the rebellious films that shook up 1950s cinema!

questions.question: James Dean starred as the troubled teenager Jim Stark in which iconic 1955 film?
In 'The Wild One' (1953), Marlon Brando's character is asked 'What are you rebelling against?' What is his famous reply?
James Dean appeared in only three major films before his death. Which of these was NOT one of them?
In 'Rebel Without a Cause,' Jim Stark engages in a dangerous game called a 'chickie run.' What does it involve?
Marlon Brando played which character in 'On the Waterfront' (1954)?
In 'On the Waterfront,' Brando delivers the famous line 'I coulda been a contender' while riding in what?
James Dean died tragically in a car crash in 1955 at what age?
In 'East of Eden' (1955), James Dean's character Cal is based on which biblical figure?
'The Wild One' is set in a small California town terrorized by what kind of gang?
Which 1955 film starring Glenn Ford depicts a teacher dealing with violent students at a troubled school?
'Blackboard Jungle' famously featured which Bill Haley & His Comets song over its opening credits?
Which actress co-starred with James Dean in 'Rebel Without a Cause' as Judy?
Paul Newman played a rebellious pool hustler in which 1961 film?
In 'Giant' (1956), James Dean plays Jett Rink, a ranch hand who strikes it rich from what?
Which style of acting, associated with Brando and Dean, emphasized emotional truth and personal experience?
